content: {"locationId": "13485", "organizationId": "10595", "name": "SALVATION ARMY CORSICANA", "address1": "212 E. 1ST AVE", "address2": "", "city": "CORSICANA", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "75110", "country": null, "phone": "903-874-7131", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "32.098792", "longitude": "-96.465311", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Collin, Dallas, Delta, Ellis, Fannin, Grayson, Hopkins, Hunt, Kaufman, Lamar, Navarro, Rockwall", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "", "notes": "Greetings,  Neighbors we offer monthly food boxes on Monday, Wednesday and Friday. Tuesday and Thursday are Social Service days. You can come and request an application for assistance any day but can only make appointments with the Social Service Worker on Tuesdays and Thursdays. We offer utility, rental and emergency housing assistance. We also offer clothing and furniture vouchers.
